Literature.Title: Novel cycloundecapeptides related to gramicidin S with both high antibiotic activity and low hemolytic activity.
Literature.Author: Tamaki M, Takanashi K, Harada T, Fujinuma K, Shindo M, Kimura M, Uchida Y

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Sheep erythrocytes:40% Hemolysis=50 µM,Sheep erythrocytes:60% Hemolysis=100 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis NBRC 3513(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Bacillus megaterium ATCC 19213(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis NBRC 12933(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus NBRC 12732(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa NBRC 3080(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Escherichia coli NBRC 12734(MIC=6.25µg/ml)
